mapper.select:
select
from doc_order_header where sostatus = '60' or sostatus = '62' order by addtime desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

select c.customerid as customerId, c.h_edi_01 as customerShortName, a.orderno as orderNo, g.total_qty as totalQty, g.total_grossweight as totalGrossWeight, g.total_cube as totalCubic, a.sku as sku, d.descr_c as skuName, d.defaultreceivinguom as unit, b.soreference1 as orderCode, b.notes as notes, b.expectedshipmenttime1, b.carriername, b.consigneename, b.c_contact, b.userdefine1, b.c_address1, b.c_tel1, b.userdefine2, b.soreference1, b.notes, sum(a.qty) as qtyAllocated, a.location as locationId, GROUP_CONCAT(a.orderlineno order by a.orderno, e.picklogicalsequence, a.sku ) as orderLineNo from ACT_Allocation_Details a inner join Doc_Order_Header b on a.orderno = b.orderno inner join Bas_Customer c on a.customerid = c.customerid inner join Bas_Sku d on a.customerid = d.customerid and a.sku = d.sku left join Bas_Location e on a.location = e.locationid left join Inv_Lot_Att f on a.lotnum = f.lotnum inner join (select x.orderno, sum(x.qty) total_qty, sum(x.qty * ifnull(y.grossweight, 0)) total_grossweight, sum(x.qty * ifnull(y.cube, 0)) total_cube from Act_Allocation_Details x, Bas_Sku y where x.customerid = y.customerid and x.sku = y.sku and x.orderno = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by x.orderno) g on a.orderno = g.orderno where 1 = 1 group by c.customerid, c.h_edi_01, a.orderno, b.soreference1, g.total_qty, g.total_grossweight, g.total_cube, b.notes, a.sku, d.descr_c, d.defaultreceivinguom, a.location, e.picklogicalsequence
select code as orderType, codename_c as orderTypeName from Bas_Codes where codeid = 'SO_TYP' and code = 'SO' order by show_sequence
select code as orderStatus, codename_c as orderStatusName from Bas_Codes where codeid = 'SO_STS' order by show_sequence
select code as orderStatus, codename_c as orderStatusName from Bas_Codes where codeid = 'RLS_STS' order by show_sequence
